title: Woman Pilot

nouns: A woman is a female human.
Female adult human
An animal of the sex that produces eggs.
An adult human member of the sex that produces ova and bears young.
An adult female human.
An adult female person (as opposed to a man)
Adult female human being.
Person actively involved in flying an aircraft
Controller of aircraft.
A person who flies or navigates an aircraft
A person who is in charge of the controls of an aircraft.
An aircraft pilot is an aviator who actively and directly operates the directional flight controls of an aircraft while in flight.
Someone who is licensed to operate an aircraft in flight
A person who flies an aircraft.
An aircraft that has a fixed wing and is powered by propellers or jets
A powered heavier-than-air aircraft with fixed wings.
An airplane or aeroplane is a powered, fixed-wing aircraft that is propelled forward by thrust from a jet engine or propeller.
A powered heavier-than-air aircraft with fixed wings that obtains lift by the Bernoulli effect and is used for transportation.
Powered aircraft capable of flight using fixed wings that generate lift
An airplane; an aeroplane.

apple_vendor_description: Apple's woman pilot emoji showcases a confident and capable aviator, ready for flight. She is depicted with Apple's characteristic glossy 3D shading and realistic lighting, giving her uniform and hat a polished, professional look. This emoji embodies adventure, ambition, and breaking barriers, perfectly capturing the spirit of exploration and achievement as rendered by Apple.
